content: hey friends one thing they can plague new crafters with a glue gun or wisps
and there is a little spider web-like wisps just start popping out from the
project when you drag the glue gun right and they can be a blight on your project
but there's a really easy way to take care of those just use the hot nozzle of
the glue gun and just drag the wisp gently back into the project
they'll just blend right into the hot glue that you're already working on and
you'll just hide them up and take them right out of the project that's all you
do now the key to this is having a bare-metal nozzle okay and then
generally the more expensive glue guns have the nozzle covered so it's better
to get a cheaper glue gun and get the uncovered metal nozzle that way you can
just drag those right back in and if you're not sure what glue gun to get
check out Scotty's favorite glue gun video and that'll show you the perfect
glue gun to do for this type of technique hey guys I want to talk about
another issue with the glue gun and when you're trying to fill in spaces or
trying to make dirt terrain or that kind of thing by dragging the glue gun across
the surface sometimes when you get too much glue on it the molten glue just
kind of morphs together and just makes one big glob it's just like a smooth
glob and that's all you're going for if you're going for like a dirt surface you
want to kind of have a rougher surface or that kind of thing or if you want
texture on the surface so here's how you avoid that you let that dry just a bit
or you let it harden up just a bit right so that it's not molten anymore then you
do little squirts of the glue gun just my kind of micro squirts and then just
pull them drag it around the project and then you end up with some really nice
detail you can drag the nozzle itself or the tip and you end up with some really
nice texture on these projects so that's one way you can avoid that kind of
homogenous just one one goop that just doesn't have any texture on it there you
go there's a couple of tips from your DM Scotty have fun
have a great time with the glue gun and happy crafting hello gloopy they go down
here hope you enjoy the up hey wait a minute here I'm the official

better watch it you're gonna make me mad I'm gonna have
to glue you to the spot and you'll never move again Oh what okay and they're mine
